mapper.insert: insert into member(mid, mname, mpassword, mtel, mintroduce, msex, mphoto, mrole,menabled) values (#{mid},#{mname},#{mpassword},#{mtel},'hi','1','unnamed.png','ROLE_USER',#{menabled})
mapper.update: update member set mname=#{mname}, mtel=#{mtel}, msex='1', mpassword=#{mpassword}, mintroduce=#{mintroduce}, mphoto=#{mphoto} where mid=#{mid}
